test_human_epi_model module

Unit Testing for Human Epi model code

Contains unit tests for CIMMID Human Epi code.

usage: pytest

class test_human_epi_model.TestDengue

Bases: object

Defines a class to test dengue code.

class TestModelOutput

Bases: object

Tests for run_model() and corresponding output for DengueSEIRModel and DengueSEIRModel.param_dict.

test_eq_points_param_dict_success(eq, param_dict)

For model runs of param_dict method with initial states as equilibrium points, check that output does not change at all.

test_eq_points_success(eq)

For model runs with initial states as equilibrium points, check that output does not change at all.

test_fit_method_success()

Test that fitting framework is returning numeric values for all parameters desired and that the values are in the designated range

test_model_out_param_dict_success(param_dict)

For identical model runs of param_dict method, check that each output has correct dimensions, that the outputs are identical, and that the output changes over time.

Check that param_dict model run is different from standard model run.

test_model_out_success()

For identical model runs, check that each output has correct dimensions, that the outputs are identical, and that the output changes over time.

test_zero_param_values_success()

For model runs where a_v = 0 and beta_h = 0 check that Sh stays constant

test_arg_error(monkeypatch)

tests TypeError generated when no configuration file is passed

test_param_dict_col_names_error()
test_param_dict_method_arg_error(monkeypatch)

tests TypeError generated when no param_dict is passed in the class method.

test_param_values_error(monkeypatch, config_file)

tests parameter value errors.

attributes:

dengue_param_arglist: list of configuration file with bad parameter values.

test_type_error(monkeypatch, config_file)

tests TypeError exceptions.

attributes:

type_error_arglist: list of configuration file with values to trip TypeError.

test_value_error(monkeypatch, config_file)

tests ValueError exceptions.

attributes:

value_error_arglist: list of configuration files with values to trip ValueError for fitting code.
